metadata.title: CVE-2022-3813 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in AxiomaticBento4. This affects an unknown part of the component mp4edit. Themanipulation leads to memory leak. It is possible to initiate the attackremotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Theassociated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212679.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
